frame.name: Source_path_goal
frame.definition: <def-root>Basic Image Schema: the <fen>Trajector</fen> moves (or is conceived as moving) from the <fen>Source</fen> along the <fen>Path</fen> to the <fen>Goal</fen> using the <fen>Means</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Trajector
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity that moves (or is conceived of as moving) from the <fen>Source</fen>, along the <fen>Path</fen> to the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Source
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of the initial location of the <fen>Trajector</fen>, before a motion event begins.</def-root>

FE.name: Path
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of the intermediate position of the <fen>Trajector</fen>, after departing the <fen>Source</fen> and before arriving at the <fen>Goal</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Goal
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of the location that the <fen>Trajector</fen> ends up.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The action or state-of-affairs that causes the <fen>Trajector</fen> to change location.</def-root>
